QuestData.Title: Drust and Ashes
QuestData.Description:
The Drust encroach upon the Grove of Awakening, $n!
We must fly in defense of Ardenweald!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend the Grove of Awakening from the Drust and slay Gorak Zhar.
QuestData.RewardText:
Well done, $Ghuntsman:huntress;.
You have saved Ardenweald from the Drust, and in so doing, protected countless other realms from their darkness.
